code: import React from'react';import'./App.css';var arr=[1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9];var array=[];var tictactoe=function tictactoe(id){document.getElementById(id).disabled=true;if(array.length<9){array.push(id);document.getElementById(id).innerHTML='X';var newArr=arr.filter(function(a){return!array.includes(a);});var other=newArr[parseInt(Math.round(Math.random()*(newArr.length-1)))];console.log(newArr,other);if(other){array.push(other);document.getElementById(other).disabled=true;document.getElementById(other).innerHTML='O';}}var matchArray=['123','456','789','147','258','369','159','357'];matchArray.map(function(mar){if(document.getElementById(mar[0]).innerHTML.length>0&&document.getElementById(mar[0]).innerHTML===document.getElementById(mar[1]).innerHTML&&document.getElementById(mar[0]).innerHTML===document.getElementById(mar[2]).innerHTML){document.getElementById('none').style.display='block';document.getElementById('noneText').style.display='block';document.getElementById('noneText').innerHTML=document.getElementById(mar[0]).innerHTML+' WON';}});};function App(){return React.createElement("div",null,React.createElement("h1",null,"My Tic Tac Toe Game"),React.createElement("div",{className:"grid-box"},arr.map(function(item){return React.createElement("button",{onClick:function onClick(){return tictactoe(item);},id:item,key:item});})),React.createElement("button",{className:"refresh",onClick:function onClick(){return window.location.reload();}},"RESET GAME"),React.createElement("span",{id:"none",style:{display:'none'},onClick:function onClick(){return window.location.reload();}}),React.createElement("span",{id:"noneText",style:{display:'none'},onClick:function onClick(){return window.location.reload();}}));}export default App;
